Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
cop4331.model.Inventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject, Iterable<ProductComponent>
public class Inventory extends Object implements Iterable<ProductComponent>, Subject

Represents the inventory of products managed by the system. Provides functionality to add, remove, update, and retrieve products. Implements the Iterable and Subject interfaces.

Author:
Benjamin Carver

      Parameters:

      IllegalArgumentException - If the product is null or already exists in the Inventory.

      public void removeProduct(ProductComponent product)

      Removes a product from the Inventory.

      Parameters:
      product - The product to be removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the product is null or does not exist in the Inventory.

    • setProduct

      Sets a product in the Inventory to a new value allowing for editing of product details like prices and type.

      Parameters:
      product - The product to be put into the inventory.
